programme.title: Wildest Islands: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: The Falkland's bleak, battered, and windswept archipelago lies 460 km from the South American mainland. Rugged mountains and expansive pristine coastline are a unique home for wildlife  especially for one of the world's most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes
programme.desc: Around 10% of the world's species live in Vietnam, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different. During the war, Vietnam's forests were decimated, but as it always does, life fought back.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil
programme.desc: Just 460,000 people live in Tasmania, an island off the southeast coast of mainland Australia. While its human population is small, the majestic state is rich in natural wonders and is known for its large tracts of pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Iceland: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Iceland is a land born out of fire, sculpted by ice. This unique island is home to some of the planet's rarest and most spectacular creatures and it harbors some of the most extreme environments on Earth.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert
programme.desc: In this episode of Wild Places, we join botanist Peter Latz, who believes the biggest influence on the Australian arid landscape has been fire. Years ago, Peter wondered how different this country would have looked like without the influence of it.

programme.title: Jumper

programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Target
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fatal Abduction
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear, kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Web of Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Face Of Tragedy
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining four chefs sample one of Ramsay's complex entrees and then must re-create it correctly and two of the chefs face elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cooking competition reaches its climax, Gordon presides as the two remaining contestants choose a kitchen team made up of their former rivals. Who will best organise their former teammates and lead themselves to victory this year?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay splits the contestants into two teams along gender lines and asks them to present their signature dishes, with the winning team getting to spend an evening with William Shatner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The men's team get a head start on the first challenge after some successful crab fishing, but can the women edge ahead when it comes to the cooking? Dinner service sees an infuriated Gordon throw an entire team out of the kitchen.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the chefs are given a rude awakening as they are tasked with entering an icy lake early in the morning to match up fish heads to their correct bodies. The winning team end up getting even wetter during surfing lessons.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel is back at it, as one of his most eccentric clients throws down the challenge on a lead sled transformation

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the Lead Sled Challened

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Days Of Reckoning
programme.desc: Kate learns a valuable lesson about trusting her heart when she realises she was wrong to go to the police about Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Scratch The Surface
programme.desc: When Leo returns to the district, Stevie loses control when trying to prove he murdered Harry Ryan. Alex discovers Fiona lied about the pregnancy.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: For Better or Worse
programme.desc: Moira’s decision to take a shortcut leads to a dangerous petrol spill on Drovers Run. His marriage on shaky ground, Alex’s world is turned upside down when he and Stevie nearly kiss.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Eleventh Hour
programme.desc: As Stevie ties up loose ends on her last day at Drovers Run before trial, she’s saved at the final hour by a desperate confession. Eager to integrate herself into the community to save her marriage, Fiona joins the CFS.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Old Wrongs
programme.desc: Jodi receives ghostly help from the past on Gungellan’s 150th anniversary celebration. Rose arrives to do work experience – but it’s not the joyful reunion that Stevie has imagined.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Handle With Care
programme.desc: Rose falls for a seemingly reformed Leo. Riley reveals the truth of his army days to Jodi on an overnight muster. Regan proposes to Dave with devastating results.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Girlfrenzy
programme.desc: With Maya and Joan becoming close friends, Toni becomes jealous and feels she's losing her best friend.

programme.title: Girlfriends: The Importance of Being Frank
programme.desc: Joan starts dating her client's very attractive accountant Keith, only to be stalked by his estranged wife.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Everything Fishy Ain’t Fish
programme.desc: Joan learns that Maya's husband may be cheating on her and must face whether or not it's a good idea to tell her friend. Toni dates a City Councilman who can help further her career.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Love The One You're With
programme.desc: Kim’s tired of being on diaper duty, and Professor Oglevee is shocked at his reaction to Nikki’s new romance.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Baby Girl
programme.desc: As Kim prepares to raise Michael’s baby, Professor Oglevee tries to sort out his feelings for Nikki.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: CRAZY LOVE
programme.desc: Nikki’s torn between two lovers: Professor Oglevee and his sexy friend, Kenny.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Not So Super, Super
programme.desc: Nikki and Kim cause chaos as the superintendents of their apartment complex.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Nobody’s Fool
programme.desc: While T and Professor Oglevee date the same woman, Nikki butts heads with her boss.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: A Knockout Times Two
programme.desc: Nikki 'Rocky' Parker steps into the ring to fight for her man.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Baby, You’ve Got To Go
programme.desc: When Kim’s boyfriend moves in, Nikki moves out.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Mummy’s The Word
programme.desc: For Kim, Nikki and their friends, Halloween becomes a fright night to remember.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn’t the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Prison
programme.desc: A small prison in Yorkshire gives a big impact when Yvette and her team attempt to stay the night. Although many inmates were released some are still locked up and they are not happy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on a three-part investigation that tests them to the very core. A place that surprised intrigued and terrified the hardened team, making Standon Hall the most fearful place they have investigated.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 2
programme.desc: Part two of this mammoth investigation and Yvette has some harsh words for Karl as he decides to take a risk that proves too dangerous. With something that wants them out, the investigation gets aggressive.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 3
programme.desc: The concluding part of the team’s most scary investigation to date, but will they last the night as something definitely wants them out.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Croxteth Hall Part 1
programme.desc: The team take on one of the grandest properties in Great Britain, Liverpool’s Croxteth Hall in a non-stop two-hour heart pounding investigation.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Aloha
programme.desc: A Hawaiian singer learns to overcome self-pity after being disabled in a truck accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a teenage cancer patient named Lee who wants to save the dolphins.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Lee's cancer is now in remission. She gets back to work on her save-the-dolphins campaign.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven Nose, Mister Smith
programme.desc: Jonathan must stop an angel who's back on Earth with the intention of breaking up his son's marriage.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Du Plessis has started a one man campaign of vandalism against the new neighbours at Mara; Peeters and the mining company. When Peeters catches him on CCTV, Du Plessis is fined and given a restraining order to keep him away from Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Du Plessis comes to meet Caroline's plane but he doesn't seem happy – he has seen that the mining company have already started building the road which threatens Leopard's Den.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: The family are making arrangements to leave Leopard's Den, all except Du Plessis who is steadfastly refusing to accept that he has lost his home. He won't use his share of the money from the sale of the land to buy somewhere else.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: The family have been squatting at Leopard's Den as they prepare to make their last stand to prevent the bulldozers from destroying their home. Du Plessis and Fatani bring elephants and a giraffe to dissuade the construction crew from moving in.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Leopard's Den, the family are split across continents. Caroline, Liv and a heavily pregnant Alice are in the UK, while Danny and Du Plessis have remained in South Africa.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: With Friends Like This
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down outside his home . Sgt. Joe Kenda and Det. John Anderson must determine whether the killer was a complete stranger, a barrio gang member, or a jealous lover.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Killer Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: When 22 year-old Micki Filmore is found raped and murder in her apartment, detective Kenda focuses his investigation on her activities the previous night.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Mr. Violence
programme.desc: 29yr old Chris is shot in cold blood outside a neighborhood bar. Faced with a trio of suspects, Kenda trusts his gut and makes a controversial decision.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes of a Child
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Run Home Roscoe!
programme.desc: When Jorge Huerta first laid eyes on him, six month old Akita Roscoe, seemed like a normal, happy puppy. Since joining the Huerta family, Roscoe has refused to go outside the family’s property.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maya, Sara, and Lilly
programme.desc: Maya, an adopted Border Collie/Spring Spaniel Mix loves to jump but is hurting her owner’s neck. Next we meet Sara, an overly-aggressive Shepherd mix and Lilly, a pushy Poodle.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Delta and Dong Dong
programme.desc: Delta, a dog with aggressive behavior and a fear of men. Dong-Dong, a rescue from Taiwan, who has found solace in the living room chair of his adopted home. He won’t get up for anything.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Dexter and Nasir
programme.desc: A Chicago art teacher wants to unify her adopted Rottweiler/shepherd’s dual personality. Singer Patti LaBelle is afraid of her guard dog, an aggressive 150-pound South African boerboel.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Teenage Savior
programme.desc: Over 2,000 people gathered at a local PETCO in hopes of a session with Cesar. This episode follows two of these troubled canines. Things get serious when Cesar's son joins in to help.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: At Night All Cats Are Gray
programme.desc: A lady claims an odd man is following her and fears for her life. She’s later found murdered...in mismatched color, a telling clue for the inspector.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Case of the Kidnapped Poodle
programme.desc: Colonel March investigates a valuable stolen diamond as well as the kidnapping of a little boy's poodle; he thinks both incidents may be connected.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Invisible Knife
programme.desc: March must solve the mystery of how a man could be stabbed to death by an invisible knife, while attempting to summon The Devil during a black rite.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Strange Event at Roman Fall
programme.desc: A wife reports her husband, a reclusive mystery writer, has fallen off a cliff. Suspicion points to her as the killer and Colonel March investigates.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Headless Hat
programme.desc: While on holiday in France, there is a murder at the docks and Colonel March is asked by a friend of the French police to assist.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Second Mona Lisa
programme.desc: The Second Mona Lisa,' painted six months after the first, is targeted by rival collectors. Colonel March is determined to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: Death In Inner Space
programme.desc: A scientist seeks a way to suspend bodily life functions during space travel, and his test subject dies from lack of oxygen. Accident or foul play?

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Talking Head
programme.desc: A 12 year old boy insists his dead father told him to kill his mother's new fiancée. But did the father truly die in an accidental plane crash?

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Rip Van Kitty/Grabbity/The Big Catnap

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Great Getaway/Scrambled Eggs/Hansel and Garfield
programme.desc: Jon tries to getaway by going to New York only to find Garfield stowed-away in his suitcase./Sheldon gets mixed up with a turtle egg./Garfield tries to entertain Nermal by telling him a fairy tail.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Sludge Monster/Fortune Kooky/Heatwave Holiday

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: One Good Fern Deserves Another/The Goodie-Go-Round/Health Feud
programme.desc: Jon mistakenly buys a man-eating fern./Orson tries to get a record player for Bo./Jon becomes a health and exercise nut.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Gets Cancelled/Show Stoppers/Cutie and the Beast

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Lasagna Zone/Sleepytime Pig/Yojumbo

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob Gets Wired
programme.desc: When Margaret forgets to pay for some sprinkles at the local cake shop, she is hauled in as a shoplifter.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: On the Case: Follow That Car
programme.desc: When a loving father is found murdered execution-style in his own home, investigators must follow the trail of his missing car to find his cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: On the Case: Gone in an Instant
programme.desc: In Lenexa, Kansas, young women disappear from their apartments as police piece together evidence showing the terrifying crimes are connected.

programme.title: On the Case: Circled by Vultures
programme.desc: A tourist takes a photo of vultures in Joshua Tree National Park and inadvertently discovers a gruesome homicide.

programme.title: On the Case: Campus Killer
programme.desc: When a young girl goes missing from her university campus, her mother is forced to lead an investigation for the truth. Can she find her precious daughter before it's too late?

programme.title: On the Case: Murder in Room 205
programme.desc: A young woman's journey to a new life comes to a savage end in a roadside motel.

programme.title: On the Case: Racing to Justice
programme.desc: A talented chef's abduction is the impetus for what will turn out to be a chilling homicide investigation.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders enter a world where society's young people command all the power and respect.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders land in the thick of an invasion, and Quinn brings down one of the plundering ships, only to find things are not as they appear.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Quinn lands in a world where he could be forever reunited with Daelin, a long-lost love.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (John Rhys-Davies, Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks) are forced to play rough on an Earth where life is a simulated electronic war game.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: On an Earth nearly depleted of natural resources, a group of people discovers an evil use for the secret of sliding. With John Rhys-Davies, Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd and Cleavant Derricks.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (John Rhys-Davies, Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks) could pose an additional threat to a world where dangerous tornadoes have forced the population into safety zones. With guest star Corey Feldman.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: Appointment With Death: Scott Singleton
programme.desc: Robbie Coltrane examines the case of Scott Singleton, who murdered a 17-year-old girl after luring her to a bogus job interview.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: The Double Axe Murderer: Dennis Smalley
programme.desc: A double axe murderer and no clues - except tiny flakes of paint discovered deep in the wounds of one of the victims. This is a story of how forensic science - and the determination of one detective - found the killer.

programme.title: Killer Britain: Vincent Tabak
programme.desc: When landscape architect Joanna Yeates disappeared after work Christmas drinks, the nation was gripped by the search for her. Tragedy struck on Christmas day morning when her body was found in a snow-covered lane. But who had killed the young woman

programme.title: Killer Britain: Lewis Daynes
programme.desc: Breck Bednar was a loving, family-oriented 14-year-old who had lots of friends and excelled at school. But he was also seduced by the world of online gaming. He didn’t see the dangers when an older teen made lucrative job offers.

programme.title: Murder Masterminds: Murder On The Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When the body of former policewoman Taylor Wright was discovered buried on a remote Pensacola farm, detectives had a lineup of suspects to investigate, including her ex-husband from whom Taylor stole $100,000, and her new live-in girlfriend Casandra.

programme.title: Murder Masterminds: Murder In The Barnyard
programme.desc: A hog farmer claims his wife fell on a four-pronged rake and died - but there is a hole in his story and his wife's body holds the clue.

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner: Ghosts In The Machine
programme.desc: Ghosts in the Machine: Three tales of everyday objects that are haunted by the dead, including the story of a man who is attacked in bed by an invisible force.

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner: Aliens Walk Among Us
programme.desc: Stories that suggest aliens are among us, including an Arizona woman who claims to have been fathered by an alien in a top-secret government experiment.

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner: Mysterious Vanishings
programme.desc: Mysterious Vanishings: Baffling stories of people who vanished without a trace, including a young Tasmanian pilot who is chased by unidentified aircraft before disappearing.

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Medical Mysteries: Medics at a hospital fall gravely ill after treating a mysteriously ailing patient in a circumstance that can't be explained by science. Or can it?

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner: Mind Control
programme.desc: Mind Control: Three spine-tingling stories, including a seance that turns a housewife into a literary genius as she channels a spirit to write a series of acclaimed books.

programme.title: Craig Charles: UFO Conspiracies: Wales
programme.desc: Was a UFO shot down by the RAF above South Wales on the 26th of February 2016? Craig and Sarah Cruddas examine the evidence as they try to discover if it really was an extra-terrestrial event. This programme contains some flashing images.

programme.title: Moesha: Homecoming
programme.desc: With a little help from Myles and a visit from Grandma Mitchell, Moesha moves back home and returns to Crenshaw High.

programme.title: Moesha: Hello! What’s This?
programme.desc: Dee finds a joint in the couch while cleaning the house. Frank and Dee assume and accuse Mo, but Moesha is shocked when she catches Myles smoking.

programme.title: Moesha: Psyche Your Mind
programme.desc: Based on the family turmoil, the family begins counseling, but Moesha doesn’t want to air the family’s 'dirty laundry'.

programme.title: Moesha: Teacher
programme.desc: Moesha is attracted to a substitute teacher at Crenshaw. After they kiss, he leaves the school for 'personal reasons'.

programme.title: Moesha: I Know What You Did In The Third Grade
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are stalked by a student who was just released from jail who they haven’t seen since the third grade when he got into trouble because of them. Parody of Brandy’s feature 'I Still Know What You Did Last Summer…'

programme.title: Moesha: A Terrible Thing Happened On My Tour Of College
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are invited to a college to attend a Prospective Freshman Weekend and someone slips a 'roofie' in her drink. Her boyfriend Aaron keeps her from being taken advantage of.

programme.title: Moesha: Birth Control
programme.desc: Moesha gets birth control pills when she decides she would like to lose her virginity to Aaron. However, things get complicated when Dee finds the pills in her purse.

programme.title: Moesha: A Class Act Christmas
programme.desc: Moesha, Hakeem, and the other employees of the Class Act are held hostage by a man dressed as Santa Claus protesting age discrimination.

programme.title: Moesha: The Crush
programme.desc: A friend of Myles who has a crush on Moesha pretends he cannot read so she can tutor him. However, after an article she writes about the success she has had with the little student is published in the LA Times, Moesha learns a hard lesson.

programme.title: Moesha: Barking Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Hakeem accepts a job as assistant manager of the Class Act claiming there are financial difficulties at home. Moesha, concerned about his college education, confronts his mother who denies his claims.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Home Counties
programme.desc: The home counties are the location for this weeks search. Phil is helping picky buyers Lysan and Bo leave the hustle and bustle of London and get back to their roots in Bedfordshire.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Hampshire
programme.desc: They've got a sailor looking for his first home and a soldier who's about to be made homeless.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Northampton
programme.desc: Despite a slowdown in the housing market, property is still very much headline news, and we love it! But, finding that all singing, all dancing dream home is tougher than ever!

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: South East London
programme.desc: From a design duo looking for their next project to a couple who are finally ready to put down roots and buy a home together this search takes Phil and Kirstie to South East London and on a journey like no other!

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Merseyside
programme.desc: Gary Wakefield and wife Nicky don't try to disguise themselves-they admit they are the fussiest house-hunters in the country.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Revisit 1: Sutton Coldfield/Norwich
programme.desc: In this episode, Kirstie and Phil are catching up with two couples who gave them two tough challenges in two fast moving property markets – Sutton Coldfield in Birmingham and Norwich.

programme.title: Dynasty: Alexis in Blunderland
programme.desc: Suspecting her accountant has worked with Sean to ruin Colbyco, Alexis faces the reality she may lose her empire; receiving bad news from her doctor, Krystle asks Fallon to gather the family.

programme.title: Dynasty: Every Picture Tells a Story
programme.desc: Surrounded by those she loves, Krystle resolves to live; Fallon takes the picture of Blake and the dead man to the morgue, unaware she is being watched; Accusing Blake of killing him twenty five years ago, Alexis vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Last Hurrah
programme.desc: Interpreting Alexis' vendetta against Blake as a love/hate relationship, Dex tells Alexis he is through being taken for granted by her; Sammy suspects Virginia may not be as naive as she wants people to think.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Wedding
programme.desc: Krystle agrees to have her operation, but only after Blake signs her divorce papers and living will, to be enacted if the surgery is not a success; Fallon is haunted by recurring dreams of Roger Grimes.

programme.title: Dynasty: Ginger Snaps
programme.desc: Krystle's operation is unsuccessful as she slips into a coma. Told she will probably never recover, a grieving Blake returns to Denver; Sammy Jo is attacked by an unknown assailant; Dex discovers Joanna is a link to Alexis' controller, Heath.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.61
programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.103
programme.desc: Threats to kill kittens, questionable remarks about a man’s sexuality and inappropriate, drunken toasts after the death of a child come into play when ex-friends fight over alleged vandalism.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.36
programme.desc: Young man admits making payments on dirt bike he claims was a gift from ex-girlfriend/Man accuses 15-year-old of throwing rock at truck on freeway; teenager blames cousin, countersues for harassment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.107
programme.desc: Woman countersues roommate's husband for sexual advances amid back rent lawsuit/Man denies requesting mother's payments on Audi A6 in lawsuit.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.47
programme.desc: A woman’s finger is broken after an argument at a party over alleged cocaine use; she claims she was pushed down the stairs by her roommate/Arrested as a result of bouncing two checks, a man sues a former friend who gave them to him.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.145
programme.desc: Botched football jerseys are the source of contention between fellow team moms who are suing each other for refunds and damages from alleged harassment. A HUD house inspection leads to a conflict between a teenage mother and her ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.168
programme.desc: Woman allegedly destroys sister's TV after affair with ex-boyfriend revealed. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for instigating violence at house party brawl.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.180
programme.desc: A 66-year-old analyst for the U.S. Department of Defense claims he was intimate with a 27-year-old sports bar worker and that she owes him money. She denies his claims.

programme.desc: Baby Bop and BJ have fun playing ball in the park. Barney helps them learn that trying something new can also be fun. Baby Bop prepares a special picnic for BJ, but much to his surprise, it consists mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Australia

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O (Original)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O (Original)

programme.desc: MacGyver and Pete Thornton reminisce about past adventures as Pete prepares for eye surgery to treat his Glaucoma.

programme.title: MacGyver

programme.desc: MacGyver picks up his best friend's father to take him to his grandson's Bar Mitzvah and finds himself inadvertently involved in an FBI/CIA mission.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Rowdy Yates rescues a legendary old pioneer from a lynch rope, but must pursue him into the mountains when the pioneer escapes.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: A new drover wounds the younger brother of a cattleman in a gun battle he sought to avoid and the cattleman vows vengeance.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Rowdy Yates is brought to "trail" by his former Confederate Army buddies who say he betrayed their plan to escape a Union prison.

programme.title: Rawhide

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: When Latka Gravas is rejected by a young beauty, he sets out on an uproarious crash course to learn to be a swinging American Bachelor, a turnabout that works fantastically with the girls but turns off all of his friends at the garage.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Jim turns into a soothsayer when he warns of a bizarre catastrophe to befall Alex that also involves an affair with a beautiful blonde.

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Louie turns into a jealous romantic when his overtures to accompany Elaine on her European vacation are rejected. Instead, Alex becomes the pretty cabbie's holiday companion on a tour of Europe's hot spots—culminating in a romantic rendezvous.

programme.title: Touched By An Angel

programme.title: Touched By An Angel
